Key Match Events: Lionel Messi scored the opening goal in the 22nd minute
Julian Alvarez scored the second goal in the 51st minute
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi commented on Argentina's performance and their journey in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at MetLife Stadium, home of the NFL's New York Giants and Jets, and the venue for the 2026 FIFA World Cup final
Canada's captain Alphonso Davies had to leave in the 71st minute after being injured in a hard tackle
Others: Canada fell 2-0 to Argentina in the Copa America semifinal
Argentina will play either Colombia or Uruguay in the championship game
